languages.text: {n}Маражай растягивает рот в зверином оскале.{/n} "Осторожнее, {name}. Я не буду терпеть подобные слова всегда — даже принимая во внимание вашу... удручающую простоту мышления и ничтожные инстинкты самосохранения".

{n}Marazhai's mouth stretches into a wide, feral grin.{/n} "Careful, {name}. My tolerance for such remarks will run out eventually — even given your depressingly simplistic mind and non-existent instinct for self-preservation."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай растягивает рот в зверином оскале.{/n} "Осторожнее, {name}. Я не буду терпеть подобные слова всегда — даже принимая во внимание вашу... удручающую простоту мышления и ничтожные инстинкты самосохранения".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches into a wide, feral grin.{/n} "Careful, {name}. My tolerance for such remarks will run out eventually — even given your depressingly simplistic mind and non-existent instinct for self-preservation."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}La boca de Marazhai esboza una sonrisa salvaje.{/n} «Cuidado, {name}. Mi tolerancia para esos comentarios terminará por agotarse, a pesar de tu mente deprimentemente simple y tu total carencia de instinto de autoconservación».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches into a wide, feral grin.{/n} "Careful, {name}. My tolerance for such remarks will run out eventually — even given your depressingly simplistic mind and non-existent instinct for self-preservation."

traits.locale_text: {n}La boca de Marazhai esboza una sonrisa salvaje.{/n} «Cuidado, {name}. Mi tolerancia para esos comentarios terminará por agotarse, a pesar de tu mente deprimentemente simple y tu total carencia de instinto de autoconservación».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋咧开了嘴，露出了野兽般的笑容。{/n}“要当心，{name}。我早就明白，你的头脑简单得令人沮丧，也没有任何自我保护的本能。但即便如此，像这样的言论，最终也会耗光我的耐心。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches into a wide, feral grin.{/n} "Careful, {name}. My tolerance for such remarks will run out eventually — even given your depressingly simplistic mind and non-existent instinct for self-preservation."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋咧开了嘴，露出了野兽般的笑容。{/n}“要当心，{name}。我早就明白，你的头脑简单得令人沮丧，也没有任何自我保护的本能。但即便如此，像这样的言论，最终也会耗光我的耐心。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの口が大きく広がり、狂暴な笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「気をつけるんだな、{name}。たとえ気が滅入るほどの単純な心を持ち、自己保存の本能が存在しないとしても、そのような発言に対する俺の許容範囲は、いずれ尽きるだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches into a wide, feral grin.{/n} "Careful, {name}. My tolerance for such remarks will run out eventually — even given your depressingly simplistic mind and non-existent instinct for self-preservation."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの口が大きく広がり、狂暴な笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「気をつけるんだな、{name}。たとえ気が滅入るほどの単純な心を持ち、自己保存の本能が存在しないとしても、そのような発言に対する俺の許容範囲は、いずれ尽きるだろう」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les lèvres de Marazhai s'étirent en un large sourire féroce.{/n} « Prudence, {name}. Ma tolérance envers ce genre de remarques a des limites... même pour un esprit aussi étriqué et dénué d'instinct de conservation que le vôtre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches into a wide, feral grin.{/n} "Careful, {name}. My tolerance for such remarks will run out eventually — even given your depressingly simplistic mind and non-existent instinct for self-preservation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les lèvres de Marazhai s'étirent en un large sourire féroce.{/n} « Prudence, {name}. Ma tolérance envers ce genre de remarques a des limites... même pour un esprit aussi étriqué et dénué d'instinct de conservation que le vôtre. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Mund verzieht sich zu einem breiten, wilden Grinsen.{/n} "Vorsicht, {name}. Meine Toleranz für derlei Bemerkungen hat irgendwann ein Ende — obwohl ich weiß, dass Ihr einen zum Weinen simplen Verstand und keinerlei Selbsterhaltungsinstinkt besitzt."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches into a wide, feral grin.{/n} "Careful, {name}. My tolerance for such remarks will run out eventually — even given your depressingly simplistic mind and non-existent instinct for self-preservation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais Mund verzieht sich zu einem breiten, wilden Grinsen.{/n} "Vorsicht, {name}. Meine Toleranz für derlei Bemerkungen hat irgendwann ein Ende — obwohl ich weiß, dass Ihr einen zum Weinen simplen Verstand und keinerlei Selbsterhaltungsinstinkt besitzt."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches into a wide, feral grin.{/n} "Careful, . My tolerance for such remarks will run out eventually — even given your depressingly simplistic mind and non-existent instinct for self-preservation."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzüne büyük, vahşi bir gülümseme yayılıyor.{/n} "Bana bak {name}... Bu tarz laflara hep müsamaha göstereceğimi sanma. Aklı ermiyor, kiminle nasıl konuşacağını bilmiyor demem... Yakarım."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth stretches into a wide, feral grin.{/n} "Careful, {name}. My tolerance for such remarks will run out eventually — even given your depressingly simplistic mind and non-existent instinct for self-preservation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzüne büyük, vahşi bir gülümseme yayılıyor.{/n} "Bana bak {name}... Bu tarz laflara hep müsamaha göstereceğimi sanma. Aklı ermiyor, kiminle nasıl konuşacağını bilmiyor, demem... Yakarım."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
